name: KayserRotz
description:
Welcome to planet KyserRotz,a high-developed outer space colony which have unlimited possibility.Unfortunately,all the future have been lost,the walking-dead have crawled in this place.As the member of investigation team,you have to be very careful,chose your update with very cautious,and stand to the last.
*Players will face waves after waves of walking-dead,challenge their skill and limite againsting this horrible army.
*Verified difficulty design.No mater rookies who want to enjoy pleasure of overkilling,or hard core players who want to challenge themselves,all could enjoy this game.
*Verified enemy design.From normal zombie to heavily armed monster.
*Gather items and materials during game-play to unlock more update and content.
*compete with other players by Ranking.
